item.title: 多諧振蕩器
item.description: BJT實現 無穩態多諧振盪器 (() = { const scheme = document.documentElement.dataset.scheme; const img = document.getElementById("tikz-bjt-multivibrator"); const url = 'https:\/\/blog.ling.moe\/file-storage\/public\/tikz\/' + (scheme ? scheme : 'light') + '/bjt-multivibrator.svg'; img.setAttribute('src', url); })(); .tikz-wrapper { padding: 0 20px; } .tikz-img { display: block; margin: auto; } .tikz-capt { box-sizing: border-box; margin-top: 10px; line-height: 25.9px; text-align: center; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(116, 116, 116) } @media screen and (min-width: 680px) { .
